English: I can't eat that cat food until Wave {0}!
String Description: Can't use power up because it's level locked.

English: I can only eat one cat food at a time!
String Description: Cant use power up because it's already in use

English: Not enough money!\n\nSwipe two mice at once to earn more!
String Description: Can't use power up because user can't afford it

English: Cat food helps me move faster!
String Description: Explain power up that increases speed

English: This cat food helps me see better!
String Description: Explain power up that widens cat's field of view

English: Try new Giant Paws cat food!
String Description: Explain power up that makes cat paws bigger

English: This cat food makes me toot!
String Description: Explain power up that makes cat fart

English: Buy me cat food for extra help!
String Description: Explain general idea of power ups

English: I feel frisky!\n\nLet's catch some mice while it lasts!
String Description: Message when fast powerup starts

English: Better eyesight means less turning!
String Description: Message when vision powerup starts

English: No mouse shall escape my mighty paws!
String Description: Message when giant paws powerup starts

English: The mice slow down when things get a little stinky...
String Description: Message when fart powerup starts

English: Yikes!\n\nI'd better catch that mouse!
String Description: Tutorial: explain you need to catch mice

English: I'll swipe where you tap but I'm pretty lazy.\n\nPlan ahead!
String Description: Tutorial: explain you show swipe ahead of mice

English: Drag my backside to turn me faster!
String Description: Tutorial: explain you can turn faster by dragging cat's butt

English: A trap will stop an escaping mouse, but then it's gone for good!
String Description: Tutorial: explain the use of traps

English: OH NO!!\n\nA mouse got away, I'm in trouble now!
String Description: Tutorial: explain game loss condition

English: The catfood is all gone!\n\nBuy me more, but watch the prices!
String Description: Tutorial: explain boosts run out after a while

English: I got Angus in 2011 as a kitten. He was already named \"Angus\" and the name stuck: he was absolutely an Angus.
String Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus

English: I had just gotten a female kitten, Curry, and she was a bit wild. The vet suggested a boy cat would help her calm down.
String Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus

English: Angus and Curry became great friends. He would pounce on her occasionally. She usually deserved it.
String Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus

English: He was the only cat I ever met who liked to have his belly rubbed. His massive, fuzzy white belly...
String Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus

English: He was a glutton. If I didn't hold him down at feeding time he'd stick his face and paws into the bag of catfood.
String Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus

English: You know how some cats carry themselves with an air of dignity and mystery? Angus... not so much...
String Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus

English: He loved to groom. Start with himself, move on to Curry, then my head. Kind of sweet until the biting part.
String Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus

English: He was crazy for this little stuffed hedgehog.  He'd bat it around until it got stuck under furniture.  Then this would happen...
String Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus

English: He was always a big boy but over time he got just enormous. When he laid down he made a puddle of cat.
String Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus

English: The new kitty condo was a huge success. That red ball thingy lasted about two seconds.
String Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus

English: Angus was just as sweet and touchable as he looks, and then some. He was like a pot of warm pudding wrapped in a furry blanket.
String Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus

English: He died in August 2014. Broke my heart. We miss you, Angus...
String Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus
